title: of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 373 of 2020)), after consultation with Inland
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Wild Salmon and Sea Trout
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Wild Salmon and Sea Trout 

Tagging Scheme (Amendment) Regulations 2024. 

(2) These Regulations shall come into operation on 1 January 2025.
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited wild salmon sea trout tagging scheme (amendment) regulation 2024 (2) regulation shall come operation 1 january 2025

title: of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No. 373 of 2020)), after consultation with Inland
heading: 2. The Wild Salmon and Sea Trout Tagging Scheme Regulations 2018 (S.I.

combined total allowable catch of the rivers Caragh, Laune and Maine contributing to the 
fishery is reduced to reflect the higher risk associated with meeting the individual river 
conservation limits simultaneously.

2 In the event that draft net fishing takes place in the Common Estuary Killary, the combined 
total allowable catch of the rivers Erriff and Bundorragha contributing to the fishery is reduced 
to reflect the higher risk associated with meeting the individual river conservation limits 
simultaneously. 

3 In the event that draft net fishing takes place in the Common Estuary Owenmore, the 
combined total allowable catch of the Owenmore and Carrowmore contributing to the fishery 
is reduced to reflect the higher risk associated with meeting the individual river conservation 
limits simultaneously.
